learning_objective: Create programs that include sequences, events, loops, and conditionals.
topic: Common Health Issues and Chronic Conditions
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is an enthusiastic student who is passionate about healthcare. They are creating an application that helps users to record and monitor common health issues and chronic conditions. Have a look at Alex's initial code snippet and decide: What would be the output on the console after running Alex's code snippet, if the user has high blood pressure and high cholesterol?",
    "Answer1": "Only High Blood Pressure Alert!!",
    "Answer2": "Only High Cholesterol Alert!!",
    "Answer3": "High Blood Pressure Alert!! and High Cholesterol Alert!!",
    "Answer4": "No Alert!!",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "In the provided code snippet, Alex has implemented condition checking for both high blood pressure and high cholesterol. If a user has high blood pressure, the code will output 'High Blood Pressure Alert!!', and if a user has high cholesterol, the code will output 'High Cholesterol Alert!!'. Since the user has both conditions, the code will output both alerts.",
    "code_snippet": "boolean highBloodPressure = true\nboolean highCholesterol = true\nif highBloodPressure\n    output \"High Blood Pressure Alert!!\"\nend\nif highCholesterol\n    output \"High Cholesterol Alert!!\"\nend"
}
